meta.name: description
meta.content: We, the employees of the Navajo County Sheriff’s Office, commit to providing all individuals a safe environment using innovative techniques and resources while being sensitive to the needs of each community.

meta.name: keywords

h4.a: Navajo County recognizes Community Partners that enabled successful 2024 Primary Election

li.div: HOLBROOK, Ariz. (August 7, 2024) – Staff presented the complete abstract of votes of the 2024 Primary Election for approval to the Navajo County Board of Supervisors today with a report thanking the many partners who came together to make it possible. Read on...

h4.a: Navajo County Keeps Tax Rate Flat, Recognizes Forest Restoration & Fiber Installation

li.div: The Navajo County Board of Supervisors voted to keep the County Property Tax Rate flat for the coming year and received several updates today outlining the significant progress that has been made in forest restoration and broadband fiber installation. Read on...
